block.p: BASEBALL

American League KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Announced the contract of Tom Burgmeier, pitching coach, will not be renewed. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Claimed RHP John Sneed off waivers from Philadelphia. Designated OF Marty Cordova for assignment.
Midwest League DAYTON DRAGONS--Named Donnie Scott manager.
BASKETBALL
National Basketball Association ATLANTA HAWKS--Signed F Pete Chilcutt, G Michael Hawkins, G Matt Maloney, F Anthony Miller, G Larry Robinson and F Jason Sasser.
FOOTBALL
National Football League CLEVELAND BROWNS--Placed RB Errict Rhett on injured reserve. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Released TE Greg DeLong. SAN DIEGO CHARGERS--Released WR Mikhael Ricks.
HOCKEY

National Hockey League ATLANTA THRASHERS--Signed F Darcy Hordichuk. Reasigned G Scott Langkow to Orlando of the IHL. Placed D Adam Burt, LW Hnat Domenichelli, D Gord Murphy, D Rumun Ndur and C Patrik Stefan on injured reserve. BOSTON BRUINS--Signed G Peter Skudra to a one-year contract and LW Ivan Huml to a three-year contract. Returned Huml to Val D'Or of the QMJHL. CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Assigned F Blair Atcheynum, F Mark Bell, F Chris Herperger, D Doug Zmolek, D Nolan Baumgartner and D Chris McAlpine to Norfolk of the AHL. Released F Kris King. DETROIT RED WINGS--Placed C Steve Yzerman on injured reserve. Assigned D Todd Gill and F Jason Williams to Cincinnati of the AHL and G Ken Wregget to Manitoba of the IHL. MONTREAL CANADIENS--Signed G Jose Theodore to a two-year contract. Assigned D Barry Richter, D Miloslav Guren, F Jason Ward and F Matt Higgens to Quebec of the AHL. NEW YORK RANGERS--Assigned F Derek Armstrong, F Manny Malhotra, F Jeff Ulmer and G Jean-Francois Labbe to Hartford of the AHL; F Pavel Brendl to Calgary of the WHL; and F Jamie Lundmark to Moose Jaw of the WHL. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Assigned G Roman Cechmanek to Philadelphia of the AHL. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Assigned G Dieter Kochan to Detroit of the IHL. Placed D Paul Mara, D Petr Svoboda, D Bryan Muir, D Sergey Gusev, D Andrei Zyuzin, C Steve Martins and LW Jaroslav Svejkovsky on injured reserve.
American Hockey League ALBANY RIVER RATS--Assigned C Doug Stienstra and D Alex Johnstone to Adirondack of the UHL.
International Hockey League CHICAGO WOLVES--Released RW Peter Armbrust, C Trevor Baker, F Blaz Emersic, D Kevin Schmidt and G Joe Dimaline.
COLLEGE

CORNELL--Named Beverly Tunnicliffe women's squash coach. FLORIDA A&M--Named Kelcey Scott women's assistant basketball coach. HIRAM--Named Sean McDonnell men's basketball coach. QUINNIPIAC--Named Ed Young and Mitch Oliver men's assistant basketball coaches. SOUTHERN COLORADO--Announced the resignation of Stanley Perchan, athletic director, effective Jan. 4, 2001, so he can become director of athletic development at Florida Gulf Coast University.
